product_name: Sea to Summit Tek Towel Wash Kit
long_description: Stay fresh while traveling with the Sea to Summit Tek Towel Wash Kit. The towel and washcloth are extremely absorbent and dry quickly, and the all-purpose soap can be used on dishes, clothes or hair. Towel and washcloth are made of a quick-drying, highly absorbent blend of polyester and nylon; towel includes snap-on hang loop. Wilderness Wash soap concentrate packs a punch-just add water and use it as a body wash, shampoo, dish soap or clothes detergent. Medium-size towel measures 40 x 20 in.; large-size towel measures 48 x 24 in.; included washcloth measures 12 x 12 in. in both sizes. Sea to Summit Tek Towel Wash Kit packs into a zippered mesh pouch for easy transport and storage.
short_description: Stay fresh while traveling with the Sea to Summit Tek Towel Wash Kit. The towel and washcloth are extremely absorbent and dry quickly, and the all-purpose soap can be used on dishes, clothes or hair.
